text:
WUFT-TV. UNIVERSITY OF FLORIDA, 234 STADIUM, GAINESVILLE, FLORIDA
Hr. William G. Harley
President
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dea r Bill:
Thank you for your letter of recommendation on Rosen.
I have not heard from him. I don't know whether he is interested
in so short an assignment as is open at this time.
I have just received the report of the Airlie House
Seminar. As yet l have not had a chance to read it. As soon as
the doctoral candidates and a masters candidate wraps up the
dissertation and thesis respectively, I'll get a chance to go
over the document. The report of the Conference came as a complete
surprise. I had not received one word about the Conference - any
of its planning or anything about it during its developmental
stages. I don't know where communications broke down. I should
think members of the Board would routinely receive information
of this kind.
